original_text: And all the families that have not died will weep by themselves. And their wives will weep by themselves.’
korean_text: 모든 남은 족속도 각기 따로 하고 그들의 아내들이 따로 하리라

sentences.original_text: And all the families that have not died
And their wives will weep by themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 아내들도 스스로 울 것입니다
